trans-unit.source: Represents an instance update exception.
trans-unit.target: 表示实例更新异常。

trans-unit.source: This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 此类支持的版本控制和 Windows Workflow Foundation 的动态更新功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关工作流版本控制、 工作流标识和动态更新的详细信息，请参阅以下主题。

trans-unit.source: [Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561)
trans-unit.target: [工作流版本控制](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561)

trans-unit.source: Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 描述工作流版本控制功能在中引入的[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: [Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563)
trans-unit.target: [动态更新](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何通过使用动态更新来更新持久化工作流实例的工作流定义。

trans-unit.source: [Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564)
trans-unit.target: [使用 WorkflowApplication 标识和版本控制](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowIdentity> to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side.
trans-unit.target: 介绍如何使用 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowIdentity> 并行承载工作流的多个版本。

trans-unit.source: [Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565)
trans-unit.target: [WorkflowServiceHost 中的并行版本控制](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 介绍如何托管的单个终结点上的工作流的多个版本。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566)
trans-unit.target: [如何：并行托管多个版本的工作流](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566)

trans-unit.source: This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤[入门教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)演示更新工作流定义，以及承载在同一时间使用旧的和新定义的工作流。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567)
trans-unit.target: [如何：更新正在运行的工作流实例的定义](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567)

trans-unit.source: This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤[入门教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)演示了更新持久化工作流实例，以使用新的工作流定义。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The activities to block in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要在此实例中阻止的活动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class with the specified blocking activities.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的阻塞活动初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The activities to block in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要在此实例中阻止的活动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class with the specified message and blocking activities.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息和阻塞活动初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The activities to block in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要在此实例中阻止的活动。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.InstanceUpdateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of blocking activities for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取此实例的阻止活动的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of blocking activities for the instance.
trans-unit.target: 石林的阻止活动的集合。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Sets the SerializationInfo object with additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他异常信息设置 SerializationInfo 对象。
